title: Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle
info: The Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle is a pet summoning item which summons a pet Baby Grinch that follows the player around. Baby Grinch's Mischief Whistle has a 1/15 (6.67%) chance of being dropped by Ice Queen during the later waves of the Frost Moon event.
stat:
Type
Pet summon
Use time20 (Very fast)
TooltipSummons a Baby Grinch
Rarity03*
Research1 required
